hindi:
लूट सके तो लूट ले, राम नाम की लूट।
पाछे फिर पछतायेगा, जब प्राण जायेंगे छूट।
english:
Loot sake to loot le, Raam naam ki loot.
 Paachhe fir pachatayega, jab praan jayenge chhoot.
translation: Abundance of the God in the world, hoarde it as much as you can. Don't regret later, when the breath leaves the body.
